code: export const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE||'http://localhost:5001';async function handleRes(res){if(!res.ok){const txt=await res.text();throw new Error("API error ".concat(res.status,": ").concat(txt));}return res.json().catch(()=>null);}export async function fetchMenu(){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/menu"));return handleRes(res);}export async function getCart(sessionId){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/cart?sessionId=").concat(sessionId));return handleRes(res);}export async function saveCart(cart){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/cart"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(cart)});return handleRes(res);}export async function placeOrder(order){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/orders"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(order)});return handleRes(res);}export async function submitContact(contact){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/contact"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(contact)});return handleRes(res);}
